verses.verse: <S%G2532>This<s%> is the <S%G602>Revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G1166>show<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> happen <S%G1096>soon,<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2532>which<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> made <S%G4591>known<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3140>testified<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G5037>about<s%> everything <S%G3745>that<s%> he <S%G1492>saw.<s%>

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is he who <S%G314>reads<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> the things that are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> is at <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

<S%G2491>John,<s%> to <S%G1577>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> that are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5607>God,<s%> who is <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who is to <S%G2064>come;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2362>throne;<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3144>witness,<s%> the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> To him who <S%G25>loves<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3068>washed<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G129>blood;<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to be a <S%G935>Kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father;<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> be the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> he is <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G3507>clouds,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>including<s%> those <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1574>pierced<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> will <S%G2875>mourn<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> Even <S%G3483>so,<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G1473>"I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G1>Alpha<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5598>Omega,<s%>" <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5607>God,<s%> "who is <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who is to <S%G2064>come,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>"

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4791>partner<s%> with you <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2347>oppression,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G932>Kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G3520>isle<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3963>Patmos<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3056>Word<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G2250>the<s%> <S%G2960>Lord<s%>'s <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G4536>trumpet<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3739>"What<s%> you <S%G991>see,<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G1473>in<s%> a <S%G975>book<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3992>send<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>assemblies:<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G4667>Smyrna,<s%> <S%G4010>Pergamum,<s%> <S%G2363>Thyatira,<s%> <S%G4554>Sardis,<s%> <S%G5359>Philadelphia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2993>Laodicea.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1994>turned<s%> to <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3748>that<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> Having <S%G1994>turned,<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> golden <S%G5552>lampstands.<s%>

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G2033>the<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands<s%> was one <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> with a robe reaching down to his <S%G4158>feet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with a <S%G5552%G99999>golden<s%> <S%G2223>sash<s%> <S%G4314>around<s%> his <S%G3149>chest.<s%>

<S%G846><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G2359>hair<s%> were <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2053>wool,<s%> like <S%G5510>snow.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G1161>fire.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> were <S%G3664>like<s%> burnished <S%G5474>brass,<s%> as <S%G5613>if<s%> it had been <S%G4448>refined<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2575>furnace.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G5204>of<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> Out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1366>two-edged<s%> <S%G4501>sword.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3799>face<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G5316>shining<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G1411>brightest.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2198>Living<s%> <S%G2532>one.<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G1519>forevermore.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G2807>keys<s%> of <S%G2532>Death<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G86>Hades.<s%>

<S%G1125>Write<s%> therefore the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G1492>seen,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1526>are,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G1096>happen<s%> <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023>hereafter;<s%>

the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands.<s%> The <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>assemblies.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>assemblies.<s%>"
